titles.title: Abiding Oh So Wondrous Sweet (easy, very nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abiding - Abiding Oh so wondrous sweet I'm Resting - Resting At the Savior's feet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abiding oh so wondrous sweet I'm resting at the Savior's feet I trust in Him - I'm satisfied I'm resting in the Crucified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He speaks And by His word is given His peace a blessed Gift of heav'n Not as the world He peace doth give 'Tis through this hope My soul shall live{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I live But through His grace alone By whom The mighty work is done Dead to myself Alive to Him I count all loss His rest to win{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now rest My heart the work is done I'm saved by faith Through Christ the Son Let every power My soul employ To tell the world My peace and joy{/lang-eng}
